publicationstmt.publisher: Published by and available from the William Blake Archive, http://www.blakearchive.org,

availability.p: ©June 2014 by Morris Eaves, Robert N. Essick, Joseph Viscomi.

sourcedesc.p: These bibliographies include the most important publications written in English about Blake, his work, and his circle and should be considered a starting point for students and researchers. The bibliographies will be updated on an annual basis.
If you have further questions about reference or critical sources about Blake, please contact the reference librarian at your local library.

div1.head: About this Bibliography
div1.p: These bibliographies include the most important publications written in English about Blake, his work and his circle and should be considered a starting point for students and researchers. The bibliographies will be updated on an annual basis.
If you have further questions about reference or critical sources about Blake, please contact the reference librarian at your local library.
